lines.irish:
Dúbh dóite
Inár suí insan teach
Gan pingin rua againn le fiú dhul amach
lines.english:
Burnt out
Sitting in the house
Not a red cent between us to even go out

lines.irish:
Tá mé tinn tuirseach de bheith beo bocht
Ach tá sin ar fad ag dhul le athrú anocht
lines.english:
I’m sick and tired of living poor
But that’s all about to change tonight

lines.irish:
Mar tá mise 'is Mo Chara ag cur le chéile pleananna
'Is fuair muid ise ó doirteán, bham, bham, bham
lines.english:
Because me and Mo Chara are putting plans together
And we got her from the sink, bam, bam, bam

lines.irish:
Is roimh i bhfad beidh muid báite insan airgead
Tuilte go maith gan dabht young renegade
lines.english:
And before long we’ll be drowning in money
Well earned without a doubt, young renegade

lines.irish:
Ag rith thart, tryna grab what we can
Ó amharc, Mo Chara, sin security van
lines.english:
Running around, trying to grab what we can
Oh look, Mo Chara, that’s a security van

"Now look man, don't wanna do you no harm
Just éist leis an scéal and I'm sure it'll be grand
lines.irish:
"Féach a mhac, níl mé ag iarraidh dochar a dhéanamh ort
Just listen to the story and I’m sure it’ll be grand

lines.english:
Cause my friend Mo Chara, he's a bit of a psycho
The type of fella loses the head at a typo
lines.irish:
Mar tá Mo Chara beagán as a mheabhair
An saghas a chaillfeadh a cheann le litreoir

lines.english:
So whatever you do, do whatever he says
So éist Mo Chara, abair leis an craic if he says no
lines.irish:
Mar sin cuma céard, déan pé rud a deir sé
Mar éist le Mo Chara, abair leis an scéal mura n-aontaíonn sé

lines.english:
Móglaí get the noose, I'll proper introduce myself
I'm Mo Chara, and I'm not well, are yis ready for abuse?
lines.irish:
Móglaí, faigh an rópa, lig dom mé féin a chur in aithne i gceart
Is mise Mo Chara, agus níl mé ceart go leor — an bhfuil sibh réidh le haghaidh ciaptha?

lines.english:
Ach ar dtús I'm sure you're thinking, Aw look
That I seem decent and clever, don't I feel bad for this ever?
lines.irish:
Ach ar dtús is dócha go gceapann tú, Awh féach
Go bhfuil cuma deas agus cliste orm, nach mothaím ciontach faoi seo riamh?

lines.english:
Guilty conscience, no thanks
I meditate and have plenty of wanks
lines.irish:
Coinsias ciontach? Ní hea
Déanaim machnamh agus déanfaidh mé neart strócála

lines.english:
And I never spare a second thought for cunts in suits
And when the revolution comes, I'm first out to loot
lines.irish:
Agus ní smaoiním riamh ar na ladanna i gculaith
Agus nuair a thagann an réabhlóid, is mise an chéad cheann ag loitiméireacht

lines.english:
New guds (new guds), happy days (happy days)
So much comfort when you don't have to pay
lines.irish:
Rudaí nua (rudaí nua), laethanta sona (laethanta sona)
An oiread sin compoird nuair nach gcaithfidh tú íoc

lines.english:
And when I'm happily tripped in designer gear
Then all of you cunts are getting one behind the ear
lines.irish:
Agus nuair atá mé gleasta go gléasta i mbrandaí galánta
Beidh gach duine agaibh ag fáil ceann sa chluas

lines.english: Go raibh maith agat Móglaí , ar aghaidh linn in the stoley
lines.irish: Thanks Móglaí, on we go with the robbery

lines.english:
Oíche Shathairn, 'mon go haifreann
The collection box owes me
lines.irish:
Saturday night, come on to Mass
Tá an bosca bailithe i bhfiacha liom

lines.english:
Agus tá sé te teolaí
'is lán le pensioners homie
lines.irish:
And it’s warm and cosy
And full of pensioners, homie

lines.english: Tiocfaidh linn tús a cur le gaelgiggolos arís if you're lonely
lines.irish: We can start up the gaelgiggolos again if you’re lonely

lines.english: Money's no more stress, buíochas le G4S
lines.irish: Money’s no longer stress, thanks to G4S

lines.english: Tá ár bhfiacha ar fad íoctha, now it's time to invest, huh?
lines.irish: All our debts are paid, now it’s time to invest, huh?

lines.english:
Nah, I'm giving half to me ma
Some blood money for my honeys
And the rest to the 'ra
lines.irish:
Níl, tá leath ag dul chuig mo mháthair
Airgead salach do na cailíní
Agus an chuid eile chuig an 'ra

lines.english:
Guilty conscience, no thanks
I meditate and have plenty of wanks...
lines.irish:
Coinsias ciontach? Ní hea
Déanaim machnamh agus déanfaidh mé neart strócála...

lines.english: OBE's for the landlords
lines.irish: OBEanna do na tiarnaí talún
